name: Stay Away (KiriuOzoru, Hugo-Sousa)
description:
"Stay Away" Description:

Avoid the crowds around you as you seek out your basic necessities so that you finally get to enjoy some time alone c :

He's practicing some social distance folks...!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Walk

E - Interact ( with items and doorways )

-----------------------------------------------------

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 !

Using the "You are not alone theme".

----------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Design by: Hugo-Sousa and KiriuOzoru

Art by: KiriuOzoru

Script by: Hugo-Sousa
